metadata.title: CVE-2024-46954 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in decode_utf8 in base/gp_utf8.c in ArtifexGhostscript before 10.04.0. Overlong UTF-8 encoding leads to possible ../directory traversal.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-46954` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ghostscript - 10.02.1~dfsg1-0ubuntu7.4
libgs-common - 10.02.1~dfsg1-0ubuntu7.4
libgs10 - 10.02.1~dfsg1-0ubuntu7.4
libgs10-common - 10.02.1~dfsg1-0ubuntu7.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ghostscript package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '10.02.1~dfsg1-0ubuntu7.4').
